title: When You Become a Grandparent
itunes:summary:
Grandparents play a very key role in society today. To address this important part of the family, John and Danny discuss how parents and grandparents can get along, even when they have a disagreement on how to interact with the kids. Featuring Chrys Howard and Shellie Tomlinson.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Recieve the book "Rocking It Grand" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-09-13?refcd=1466708


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/when-you-become-a-grandparent/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
